blog.name: runyoubastards
blog.title: hanarezu ni soba ni ite
blog.description: Andrea | 17 | Gryffindor

summary: wow it has been a hot minute since i’ve last been on here. it’s strange being back here, and to be honest, i’m not sure why i'm...
body:
wow it has been a hot minute since i’ve last been on here. it’s strange being back here, and to be honest, i’m not sure why i’m posting this, let alone writing this here because chances are it’ll drown in a flood of similar posts or someone out there (i mean this /is/ tumblr after all) might say i’m just writing this ~fOr ThE cLoUt~ but i wanna get this off my chest, because i’ve been thinking about it ever since the video dan howell posted a few days ago and i only figured out how to articulate it now.

in light of dan’s coming out video, it’s just right that i apologize for my behavior during the peak of my phandom days back then. i’m not saying this because i expect something fantastical like him acknowledging this or the holy spirit coming down to make me a saint for saying all of this, but because i realize that i was in the wrong. in the time since i’ve been peak “omg dan and phil!!!!!!!!! they’re so real and you can’t convince me otherwise!!!!!!!!” and now, i like to at least think i’ve learned what limits are, and that crossing those limits can and will hurt people, even if you don’t think it will.

so after watching his video, apart from the absolute pride and joy i felt for him feeling comfortable enough to share his sexuality and for how his video brings light to for individuals in his situation and opened up discussions regarding the youth and lgbtq+ issues, i also felt an overwhelming sense of guilt for how shit of a person i was at the height of my dnp stan days. i realize that a lot of what i did way back then, especially on here with the whole pushing-the-phan-agenda thing, was in reality, really harmful and nasty.

a quick scroll of this account would show that i’m unabashedly a fandom blog. while i wasn’t necessarily the biggest fandom blog out there and i went from one fandom to another, the phandom was a constant on my blog, and i did have a few posts that gained quite an amount of attention. by today’s standards, it probably isn’t all that big. but back then, those posts gained about at least upwards of 3k+ interactions, and those posts, whoop de doo, were very (and in my opinion, rabidly) pushing-the-phan-agenda centric.

i’ll never know if dan and phil ever saw those posts, but considering that that was also around the time where tumblr was one of their main modes of interacting with their fans, i’ll just consider it highly likely that they probably had seen some of those posts.

i’m not going to deny that i was way too invested in the ship. and when i say invested, i mean digging up old posts and videos of theirs and microanalyzing everything and yelling about it everywhere bc “look at the proof!!!!11!! its undeniably real!11!!!1”. i don’t know if i should be thankful that my posts that were around that tone wasn’t among the ones that got a lot of attention (whether or not i deleted those during a purge i did a couple years back, i don’t entirely remember, but that’s beside the point) but it still did get attention, and that’s what i want to say sorry for.

i’m so, so, so sorry that i was an extremely horrible person who had no understanding about what boundaries were. i was, what, maybe 14 or 15 years old, and i was always told that by that time, you’re old enough to know right from wrong. so…. oops.

i don’t wanna point fingers, but i acted the way that i did because it was the norm not just online, but with the people i was around in real life as well. my friends–who were also into dan and phil–and i would spend eons just back and forthing about how phan was undeniably real and going on about how they’re so in love!!!1111!!1. i thought it was normal, and i went with it. after all, i’m mature enough to know right from wrong, and since everyone’s doing it, it has to be right, right?

i’m sorry. i’m sorry that i didn’t realize that what i was doing wasn’t much different from those bullies. i’m sorry that i kept sticking my nose and pushing on something that very clearly wasn’t my business. i had a number of posts that, chanced upon, wasn’t doing much to help dan in any way. if, on the off chance that either he or phil or anyone else, really, had seen those posts and felt unsafe or uncomfortable or anything like that, i’m sorry. 

i’ve since deleted those posts, or at least, the ones that showed up when i tried to look for them. i’m not sure how it’ll help, but i like to think it’s one way to right those wrongs. 

i want to apologize because i now know that i was a part of the problem, and considering that being a demon phannie was something i practically broadcasted to the world, its a part of me that i’m guilty of having ever been proud of. what i did back then was wrong, and its appalling to me how comfortable i was in acting the way that i had. being a demon phannie wasn’t the sunshines and fun times i had thought it to be, and the whole “ah, they probably won’t care anyway” mentality wasn’t, and still isn’t, helping things at all.

dan and phil have always been such a huge part of my life. i don’t think i’ll ever “grow out” of them or stop loving them. this time though, i hope that i’ve reached the level of maturity i thought i had all those years ago. this time, i now know what the right way to support them is. the relationship they share is undoubtedly special, but most importantly, something that exists only for them. it is private and shouldn’t be grounds for anyone to pick over and use as entertainment. they are still actual people who have to be given respect. i am beyond happy for the both of them, and i wish for nothing but the best for them.

here’s to moving forward, growing up, learning from mistakes, and going on to better things.

i want to apologize because i now know that i was a part of the problem, and considering that being a demon phannie was something i practically broadcasted to the world, its a part of me that i’m guilty of having ever been proud of. what i did back then was wrong, and its appalling to me how comfortable i was in acting the way that i had. being a demon phannie wasn’t the sunshines and fun times i had thought it to be, and the whole “ah, they probably won’t care anyway” mentality wasn’t, and still isn’t, helping things at all.

dan and phil have always been such a huge part of my life. i don’t think i’ll ever “grow out” of them or stop loving them. this time though, i hope that i’ve reached the level of maturity i thought i had all those years ago. this time, i now know what the right way to support them is. the relationship they share is undoubtedly special, but most importantly, something that exists only for them. it is private and shouldn’t be grounds for anyone to pick over and use as entertainment. they are still actual people who have to be given respect. i am beyond happy for the both of them, and i wish for nothing but the best for them.

here’s to moving forward, growing up, learning from mistakes, and going on to better things.

blog.name: starbursto
blog.title: My Official Writing Tumblr
blog.description: Welcome to my writing account! This is where all my DnP works are nicely organized in a satisfying way where can be easily found. You’ll also be able to send writing prompts, requests, or things of that matter. Feel free to even send a simple “Hi!”. Don’t feel shy, I don’t bite!

summary: True Colors {One-shot} - ProblematicProcrastinator - Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF) [Archive of Our Own]
body:
True Colors by ProblematicProcrastinator

Rating: General Audiences

Words: 1323 words

Pairing: Daniel Howell x Philip Lester (Phan)

Tags: Dan Howell wears makeup, Phil Lester is supportive, Fluff, Dan and Phil are cute together, Boys wearing makeup, makeup, phan makeup, Phan fluff

Language: English

Point of View: Phil Lester’s POV

Summary: Dan experiments with makeup and Phil absolutely adores it, being the supportive boyfriend that he is

Fic Preview:

“Do you think I should try makeup?”

Not the best question to ask to your boyfriend who’s sat down on the couch with a mouthful of Frosties attempting to watch Chopped reruns in peace. It completely threw me off and I nearly choked on the soggy bits of cereal!

I was used to Dan’s “experiments” at this point. I’ve known him for over 10 years and always knew how Dan tried to break gender boundaries or go against the said social norm.

Now, I refuse to call Dan feminine but he’s always been quite a, say, tender person.

Whenever I hold his hand it’s usually soft and smooth which is clear evidence of previous moisturizers or hand lotions. His nails are often well trimmed and manicured, painted with exactly two coats of matte black nail polish. Dan smells wonderful a solid 90 percent of the time due to the tropical shower gels he uses. On very rare occasion he’ll buy vanilla or one of those overpriced Bath & Body Works which make me utterly melt at the fragrance. (I admit, I’ve had to resist myself from biting or licking at his beautifully scented skin at random on days like that.)

If you wanna continue reading, click here to get transferred to Ao3:

True Colors {One-shot} - ProblematicProcrastinator - Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF) [Archive of Our Own]

Be sure to leave a Kudos and/or a comment! Each one truly means a lot to me! If you have a prompt or suggestion, send it to my ask box!

blog.name: yiffandquiff
blog.title: The Void
blog.description:
+Alexis 20 | New York

I write fics and make gifs!

Met Dan and Phil on 7/21/18

Buy Me A Ko-Fi! | Mobile Fic Link

summary: A Note About Phanfiction from a Phanfic Writer
body:
A Note About Phanfiction from a Phanfic Writer

Hey guys.

So I know that a lot has been happening and there is a lot going on with a lot of mixed feelings and I thought that I’d speak about my own phanfic writing.

When Dan’s video came out, I never once thought to myself that I needed to stop writing phanfic. I never thought about that being the reason I stopped writing. But when I saw all of the posts circulating around, I began to feel really weird about my fic writing.

To put it bluntly, I felt kind of gross.

I was writing fic about two real life guys and I suddenly felt this awful feeling creeping up my spine of “holy fuck what have I done”.

And these feelings stayed overnight into yesterday and it was really hard for me to not get the knee jerk reaction to pull the plug on all of my fics and run away as fast I could.

But then I spoke to my friends Claire and Alex and I voiced all of my concerns to them and I suddenly began to realize what I was telling them.

I wasn’t writing Dan or Phil to be Dan or Phil, I was writing them as these two characters that just so happened to be in my narratives and my universes and that’s how I want it to remain.

I’m not going to write realistic / canon verses for Phanfiction. I’m going to write alternative realities and universes that just so happen to have Dan and Phil as characters of a totally different story.

In this time, I’m going to continue to write fic until Dan or Phil say otherwise. Dan and Phil have both said that they support creative outlets and fic is a creative outlet.

I’m respecting all the boundaries I can and I really want to reiterate this. There is nothing that would upset me more than to upset or to disrespect Dan and Phil. And I want to make this abundantly clear.

I’m writing Dan and Phil as these characters that exist in a totally separate universe than the one we live in right now and that’s how I’m going to continue to write.

I saw many other writers leaving and walking away from phanfic and I get it because I almost did too. But I’m telling you that I’m still here and I’m going to try my best to write fic in a way that wouldn’t upset anyone in anyway.

Thank you.

A Note About Phanfiction from a Phanfic Writer

Hey guys.

So I know that a lot has been happening and there is a lot going on with a lot of mixed feelings and I thought that I’d speak about my own phanfic writing.

When Dan’s video came out, I never once thought to myself that I needed to stop writing phanfic. I never thought about that being the reason I stopped writing. But when I saw all of the posts circulating around, I began to feel really weird about my fic writing.

To put it bluntly, I felt kind of gross.

I was writing fic about two real life guys and I suddenly felt this awful feeling creeping up my spine of “holy fuck what have I done”.

And these feelings stayed overnight into yesterday and it was really hard for me to not get the knee jerk reaction to pull the plug on all of my fics and run away as fast I could.

But then I spoke to my friends Claire and Alex and I voiced all of my concerns to them and I suddenly began to realize what I was telling them.

I wasn’t writing Dan or Phil to be Dan or Phil, I was writing them as these two characters that just so happened to be in my narratives and my universes and that’s how I want it to remain.

I’m not going to write realistic / canon verses for Phanfiction. I’m going to write alternative realities and universes that just so happen to have Dan and Phil as characters of a totally different story.

In this time, I’m going to continue to write fic until Dan or Phil say otherwise. Dan and Phil have both said that they support creative outlets and fic is a creative outlet.

I’m respecting all the boundaries I can and I really want to reiterate this. There is nothing that would upset me more than to upset or to disrespect Dan and Phil. And I want to make this abundantly clear.

I’m writing Dan and Phil as these characters that exist in a totally separate universe than the one we live in right now and that’s how I’m going to continue to write.

I saw many other writers leaving and walking away from phanfic and I get it because I almost did too. But I’m telling you that I’m still here and I’m going to try my best to write fic in a way that wouldn’t upset anyone in anyway.

Thank you.
